description:
I wanted to get the adrenaline pumping a bit when Pavel and Calvin met. They are both big, muscular guys so I thought a little bit of sparring would get them going. Calvin was actually a bit scared... he's more of the "lover not a fighter" type. Pavel seems to go for anything you throw at him!
Of course I was going to make them wrestle naked. There was no other way. Calvin actually ended up beating Pavel! Pavel's tough guy act was out the door after that and he quickly submitted to Calvin eating out his hairy ass. Then the real fun started. Pavel threw Calvin onto the couch, legs up in the air and started pounding into him!
There is just something ridiculously hot about watching Pavel in action. Maybe it's his beautiful hairy butt? His washboard abs? Or Calvin grabbing onto his muscled legs and pulling him in deep? Calvin just seemed to keep wanting more and Pavel kept giving it to him!
title: Pavel & Calvin
